entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unneccessary schema name parameter generated in rc.2 migrations code generator #26406
  • Exception when creating new migration after updating from 6.0-rc.1 to 6.0-rc.2 #26405
  • InMemory provider and required properties #26404
  • when i use EF.CompileAsyncQuery((DbContext db, Func<TEntity, bool> filter) => db.Set<TEntity>().Where(filter)),there has been an error #26402

Closed

  • Impove unsupported type exception #26341
    7.0.0
  • Throw better error message for owned entity without owner can be attached to context #21954
    7.0.0
  • Improve Exception message: Cannot bind to constructor parameters #19383
    7.0.0
  • Indicate explicitly in constructor binding exception that entity type instances cannot be injected #17123
    7.0.0
  • IAsyncEnumerable support #26392
  • How to access the Shadow-ForeignKey-properties of an EntityEntry #26381
  • Table splitting: Make HasColumnName optional #26345
  • EF CORE 5.0 ThenInclude OrderBy, uses PK before OrderBy field, rendering it useless #26343
    6.0.0-preview5
  • EF CLI using ToTable(null) causes migration to drop non-existing column #26331
  • Unable to load shared library 'e_sqlite3' exception with net6 rc1 and efcore Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Sqlite.Core 6.0.0-rc.1.21452.1 #26163
  • .NET 6 RC2 Entity Framework -> Nullable object must have a value. #26364
    6.0.0
  • [Q] SqlNullabilityProcessor.VisitSqlFunction, Nullability of SUM function #26357
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Merged

  • No test left behind #26382
  • Improved exception messages #26398
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #26399
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [SMALL] Fix to #26357 - [Q] SqlNullabilityProcessor.VisitSqlFunction, Nullability of SUM function #26401

Updated

  • Cache ParamCount together with a statement for SQLite #26380
  • Add Migration name check #26396
